messages.message:
But, in the short term while Aaron is away:
1. We are setting up ILM policies for the metrics tables.  The duration of historical data will depend upon:
  * How much data is the consumer producing
  * Are there any retention policies that we want to comply with
  * How much space is the customer willing to lend us :slightly_smiling_face:

2. Yes, that is correct.  https://www.instabase.com/docs/content/apis/metrics-apis.html has more details:
  * https://www.instabase.com/api/v1/metrics?pretty=true should give you all the applications that are exposed through the metrics APIs
  * https://www.instabase.com/api/v1/metrics/flow?pretty=true will give you all the metrics that we have that are associated with flow
  * The attributes list in https://www.instabase.com/api/v1/metrics/flow/num_pages_processed?pretty=true should give you all the `filter-by` and `group-by` clause
